attributes.action: Test people who want to be tested for coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: If you suspect you have coronavirus like myself I called 111 spoke to doctors they said there was no testing unless seriously I’ll in hospital etc and I am worried if I have it like many others and not being tested for it! If it is the case and I’m positive for covid 19 then I can then share the news to anyone I have been in contact with for them to definitely self isolate also as if you only assume you may have it it’s getting you no where as after 14 I may clear up come out of self isolation and then catch it then as for many others we are left in the dark!!!
attributes.background: Make it easier to be tested for coronavirus

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
